message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.SD 

This paper involves the development of machine learning algorithms for gas detection using near IR spectrums. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the use of convolutional neural networks (CNN) suggests that cs.CV (Computer Vision) is also a likely sub-category. The use of Monte Carlo methods for determining optimal parameters suggests that cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) are also possible sub-categories. Finally, the use of statistical methods for data analysis suggests that cs.SD (Sound) is a less likely but still possible sub-category.
